skins.selfIntroduction: I am the first ship of the Zara class of heavy cruisers, Zara. I was born to be a marine battery, with my magnificent guns and armor plating. I served as the flagship of my squadron, at least until that fateful night...
skins.acquisition: Ciao. It's a pleasure to meet you, Commander. I'm the heavy cruiser, Zara, and I look forward to bringing victory and glory to your fleet.
skins.login: Welcome back. I've gathered everyone up and we're awaiting your inspection.
skins.details: Now, Pola and I are often praised for our beauty, but aren't you worried that all this ogling might cause some unsavory rumors?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Tenacemente, that is, fighting to the bitter end, no matter the odds, is my personal motto.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Looking up at the night sky, admiring the countless glimmering stars, it's really nice, actually. But it's better enjoyed from inside... don't you think?
skins.secretaryIdle3: By the way, I've actually got kind of an eye for fashion. How about I help dress you next time, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: You like my sword, Commander? Or could it be... something else you're interested in?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eeek?! ... Ahem! There is more to me than my armor plating, you know? Maybe you would like a taste of my guns as well?

skins.shipDescription: Phew... It's a perfect day for swimming. Oh my, Commander, did you come to swim too? Or... perhaps you had something else in mind? Ehehe~?
skins.acquisition: Phew... It's a perfect day for swimming. Oh my, Commander, did you come to swim too? Or... perhaps you had something else in mind? Ehehe~?
skins.login: Commander, please be careful swimming in the deep end, okay?
skins.details: Did you do your stretches? You don't want your legs cramping up in the water.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey, no horseplay in the pool!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I really like swimming, but the submarines and destroyers are always faster... Why is that, Commander...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Speed is one thing, but I'm quite confident in my stamina. How about it, Commander? Want to try me?
skins.secretaryTouch: Your eyes are wandering. Hehe, what's on your mind? You can tell me.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Really now, Commander? I understand your eagerness, but there's a time and place, no?
